The other forms of Gaucher disease are uncommon and do not occur more frequently in people of Ashkenazi Jewish descent.",GHR,Gaucher disease
What are the genetic changes related to Gaucher disease ?,"Mutations in the GBA gene cause Gaucher disease. The GBA gene provides instructions for making an enzyme called beta-glucocerebrosidas
